name: fargate-twitter-reader
description: Crawl Twitter's raw tweets then deliver the stream into Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose.

scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/util
scripts.build:copy: cp config.js dist/ && cp twitter_stream_producer_app.js dist/ && cp twitter_stream_producer.js dist/ && cp -r util dist/
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
